title: Teenagers talk: getting through adolescence
creator_credit: Sam Weiss and BFA Educational Media
brief_description: Presents teenagers from various ethnic backgrounds commenting on the difficulties of being an adolescent. Uses animated sequences to visually express such topics as sex, parents, drugs, peer pressure, individuality, conformity, friendship and physical maturation.
